creator: Davy.Toch@belgacom.net
text: If you call <input> after a forked <java> which doesn't require input and that doesn't have the attribute input(string)="" declared, you are required to press <ENTER> more than once. For example in the included example you are required to press <ENTER> an extra 4 times after the <input> because of the previous 4 <java> invocations).

Created attachment 22450
Testcase illustrating the problem
creator: Davy.Toch@belgacom.net
